name: WMV (Windows Media Video) File Format
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">wmv</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: File format based on ASF (Advanced Systems Format) that wraps a video bitstream. Developed by Microsoft.
